long_description: . Author: Paul Wellner. Softcover; 102 pages; color photographs and maps. Cascade Climbs, LLC; copyright 2009. Helps with trip planning and includes what to bring and how to train. Beautiful photographs from multiple stages along the route help you chart your way up the mountain. Step-by-step descriptions help you know what to expect as you climb the popular south side route. Includes 360deg aerial photographs.
short_description: Mount Hood South Side Route offers detailed information for anyone interested in climbing Mount Hood.
